document_data.name: Tanatha
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the priestess of Talos|the Zakaran vizier|Tanatha}}
'''Tanatha''' was a [[human]] [[priestess]] of [[Talos]] in service of Lord [[Vorik Aris]], operating in [[Wyvernwatch Castle]] in the [[Stonelands]] around [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: Tanatha was darkly beautiful but usually hid it with her armor, appearing anonymous and terrifying instead.
document_data.Personality: She was cruel and unpredictable, and was fully devoted to her patron and his domain of upheaval and destruction.
document_data.Abilities: Tanatha was a powerful cleric, and could call forth many spells which she largely used to smite her enemies. Her devotion as a [[stormlord (priest)|stormlord]] gave her additional storm-themed powers, including ''[[shocking grasp]]'', ''[[call lightning]]'', ''[[water walk]]'', ''[[control winds]]'', and ''[[lightning bolt]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Tanatha wore ornate black ''+3 [[full plate]]'' with a matching ''[[helm of comprehending languages & reading magic]]'' that fully hid her identity, and carried a ''+3 [[footman's mace]]'' and ''+3 [[shield]]''. She also wore a ''[[ring of regeneration]]'' and had several vials of ''[[unholy water]]''.
document_data.Activities: In [[1369 DR]], she served Lord Aris as his spiritual advisor as he schemed to overthrow King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV|Azoun IV]] and enthrone himself. She greatly anticipated the delightful chaos and war he would wreak upon [[Cormyr]], but had absolutely no loyalty to him beyond that, and was ready to abandon Lord Aris the moment his defeat seemed likely.
